parameter 1: A few things were cut from the DVD version, as well as subsequent airings after the VHS release. There was one scene with Bill trying to fix Cubby's chair and mistaking a rolling pin for one of the legs. Also, during the charades game, Bill originally had a line in response to Betty's guess: "Where did you get Ivanhoe? Nobody says Ivanhoe. Sit down, Ma!" On the other hand, the DVD features a cast list in the end credits not present on the VHS.
parameter 2: On the DVD release, the lyrics to the song "Light One Candle" have been muted and/or edited out because the publishers did not have the rights to use them. Similarly, the instrumental version of 'Michael Jackson (I)' (qv)'s "Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'" at the start of the show has been replaced with another song.
parameter 3: When originally aired, this episode featured a scene with the miller's daughter singing to her animal friends in the forest. However, all subsequent releases, be they VHS or DVD, have cut this scene.
parameter 4: Some episodes released on DVD by Starmaker II and Koch Vision were edited.
parameter 5: Some episodes released on DVD by Starmaker II and Koch Vision were edited.
parameter 6: On the DVD release, the lyrics to the song "Light One Candle" have been muted and/or edited out because the publishers did not have the rights to use them. Similarly, the instrumental version of 'Michael Jackson (I)' (qv)'s "Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'" at the start of the show has been replaced with another song.
parameter 7: Some episodes released on DVD by Starmaker II and Koch Vision were edited.
parameter 8: In the US version of this episode, 'Moira Stuart' (qv)'s appearance is deleted, and after the closing credits 'Chris Martin (XI)' (qv) and Andy (dressed as his "When the Whistle Blows" character) perform "Fix You".
parameter 9: The version on the DVD omits two scenes from the original airings: The clip montage of Robert's relationship with Amy throughout the first seven seasons, and a scene where Gianni tries to use the men's room but is uncomfortable because Marie is in the bathroom at the same time. These scenes are present in the syndicated airings, however.
parameter 10: When originally aired, this episode featured a scene with the miller's daughter singing to her animal friends in the forest. However, all subsequent releases, be they VHS or DVD, have cut this scene.
parameter 11: Repeat showings of episodes with 'Tommy Habeeb' (qv) were edited to delete Habeeb's host segments. They were replaced with new segments with new host 'Kato Kaelin' (qv).
